PerformanceLongAnimationFrameTimingScrip.summary: NOTE Experimental The scripts read-only property of the interface returns an array of objects.

remarks.para: Script attribution is provided only for scripts running in the main thread of a page, including same-origin <iframe>s. However, cross-origin <iframe>s, web workers, service workers, and extension code will not have script attribution in long animation frames, even if they impact the duration of one.
